TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit BindingGroup extends System.Windows.DependencyObject

summary.span: 包含绑定集合和用于验证对象的 对象。

span.span: Contains a collection of bindings and objects that are used to validate an object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建多个绑定之间的关系, 这些绑定可以同时进行验证和更新。A creates a relationship between multiple bindings, which can be validated and updated together. 例如, 假设应用程序提示用户输入地址。For example, suppose that an application prompts the user to enter an address. 然后, 应用程序使用用户提供的`Address`值填充类型为的对象, 该`ZipCode`对象具有`Country`属性、 `Street`、 `City`、和。The application then populates an object of type `Address`, which has the properties, `Street`, `City`, `ZipCode`, and `Country`, with the values that the user provided. 应用程序有一个面板, 其中包含四个控件, 其中每个控件都绑定到对象的一个属性。The application has a panel that contains four controls, each of which is data bound to one of the object's properties. 可以 `Address`在中使用来验证对象。You can use a in a to validate the `Address` object. 如果绑定参与到同一, 则可以确保邮政编码对地址的国家/地区有效。If the bindings participate in the same , you can ensure that the zip-code is valid for the country/region of the address. 您可以在或上设置属性。You set the property on or . 子元素继承其父元素, 就像任何其他可继承的属性一样。Child elements inherit the from their parent elements, just as with any other inheritable property. 如果发生以下情况之一, 则会将子代元素上的绑定添加到:A binding on a descendent element is added to a if one of the following situations occurs: - 绑定的源和 具有相同对象且未设置属性的元素的。The binding's source and the of the element that has the are the same object and the property is not set. - 绑定的属性等于的, 并且未显式设置为`null`。 The property of the binding is equal to the of the and they are not explicitly set to `null`. 在地址的示例中, 假定 的设置为类型`Address`的对象。In the example of the address, suppose that the of the is set to the object of type `Address`. 每个的绑定都会添加到面板的中。The binding for each is added to the of the panel. 将对象添加到。You add objects to a . 当运行时, 将作为方法的第一个参数传递。 The is passed as the first parameter of the method when the runs. 您可以使用或方法来获取对象的建议值, 并使用属性来获取绑定的源。You can use the or method on that to get the proposed values of the object, and the property to get the sources of the bindings. 同时更新绑定的源, 而不是单独更新每个绑定。A updates the sources of the binding at the same time instead of each binding being updated separately. 当您调用其中一个方法来验证数据(、 或) 时, 将对该示例中的每个的绑定进行验证并可能更新。When you call one of the methods to validate the data (, , or ), the binding for each in the example is validated and potentially updated. 当绑定为的一部分时, 除非显式设置了属性, 否则直到你调用或上的时, 绑定的源才会更新。When a binding is part of a , the source of the binding is not updated until you call or on the , unless you explicitly set the property. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个应用程序, 该应用程序提示用户输入商品的描述和价格以及产品/服务的到期日期。The following examples create an application that prompts the user to enter the description and price of an item and the date that the offer expires. 应用程序将在窗体下显示项的当前信息。The application displays the current information for the item below the form. 用户可以提交或取消更改。The user can submit or cancel the changes. 应用程序执行以下操作来实现此行为。The application does the following to achieve this behavior. - 创建并在 创建[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]应用程序的时将其添加到根。 Creates a and adds it the root when it creates the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] of the application. - 在应用程序的逻辑中调用、和以启用回滚更改。Calls , , and in the application's logic to enable rolling back changes. - 调用 方法中的以获取用户的输入, 然后检查100美元的项是否至少有七天可用。Calls in a method to get the user's input and then check that an item over 100 dollars is available for at least seven days. 下面的示例将创建[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]应用程序的。The following example creates the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] of the application. 根具有一个 , 它包含用于验证项的, 如前文所述。The root has a that contains a that validates the item, as described previously. `Price`属性 和属性的绑定对象将成为的一部分, 并且每个绑定都有一个来确保价格和日期分别是有效值。 `OfferExpires`The binding objects on the `Price` property and the `OfferExpires` property become part of the and each binding has a to make sure that price and date, respectively, are valid values. 单个属性的验证规则将在 上的中运行。The validation rules for the individual properties run before the on the . [!code-xaml[BindingGroupSnippets#WindowLayout](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindingGroupSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#windowlayout)] 下面的示例演示应用程序的事件处理程序。The following example shows the event handlers for the application. 当用户单击 "提交" 按钮时, 应用程序会调用以运行与相关联的每个。When the user clicks the Submit button, the application calls to run each that is associated with the . 如果每个成功 , 则会将值保存到对象并结束编辑事务。If each succeeds, saves the values to the object and ends the edit transaction. 如果成功, 则应用程序将开始另一个编辑事务。If is successful, the application begins another edit transaction. `true`当失败时 , 将发生事件, 因为应用程序在上 (在前面的示例中为) 设置为。 When a fails, the event occurs because the application set to `true` on the (in the previous example). `ItemError`处理事件, 并向用户显示有关验证错误的信息。`ItemError` handles the event and displays information about the validation error to the user. 该示例还处理的事件和 "**取消**" 按钮的事件。The example also handles the event for the and the event for the **Cancel** button. [!code-csharp[BindingGroupSnippets#WindowLogic](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindingGroupSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#windowlogic)] [!code-vb[BindingGroupSnippets#WindowLogic](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindingGroupSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#windowlogic)] 下面的示例演示了自定义`ValidateDateAndPrice`, 它已添加到第一个示例中的。The following example shows the custom `ValidateDateAndPrice`, which was added to the in the first example. 在其方法中使用来获取用户在窗体中输入的值, 并检查项是否超过100美元, 是否可用于至少7天。The uses the in its method to get the values the user entered into the form, and checks that if an item is over 100 dollars, it will be available for at least seven days. [!code-csharp[BindingGroupSnippets#ValidateObject](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindingGroupSnippets/CSharp/Data.cs#validateobject)] [!code-vb[BindingGroupSnippets#ValidateObject](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindingGroupSnippets/visualbasic/data.vb#validateobject)]

summary.span: 开始 中源上的编辑事务。

span.span: Begins an edit transaction on the sources in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果支持中的源放弃挂起的更改, 则可以调用来开始编辑事务, 调用以保存挂起的更改, 调用以放弃挂起的更改。If the sources in the support discarding pending changes, you can call to begin the edit transaction, call to save the pending changes, call to discard the pending changes. 对于实现 的中的每个对象, 调用For each object in that implements , calls ## Examples 下面的示例在窗口加载以开始编辑事务时进行调用。The following example calls when a window loads to begin the edit transaction. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果出现以下情况之一, 则属于: A belongs to a if one of the following cases occurs: - 绑定的源和 具有相同对象的元素的, 未设置。The binding's source and the of the element that has the are the same object and the is not set. - 绑定的属性和的设置为相同的非 null 值, 并且属于绑定的目标元素的父元素。 The property of the binding and the of the are set to the same non-null value and the belongs to a parent element of the binding's target element. - 你将添加到。You add a to .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void CancelEdit() cil managed

summary.span: 结束编辑事务并放弃挂起的更改。

span.span: Ends the edit transaction and discards the pending changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果源对象能够执行此操作并结束编辑事务, 则此方法会导致源放弃挂起的更改。This method causes the sources to discard the pending changes, if a source object is capable of doing so and end the edit transaction. 然后, 方法用保存的源值更新目标属性。Then the method updates the target properties with the saved source values. 对于实现 的中的每个对象, 调用For each object in that implements , calls ## Examples 下面的示例调用以放弃挂起的更改, 然后调用来准备重新编辑的源。The following example calls to discard the pending changes and then calls to prepare the source to be re-edited. [!code-csharp[BindingGroupSnippets#CancelEdit](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindingGroupSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#canceledit)] [!code-vb[BindingGroupSnippets#CancelEdit](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindingGroupSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#canceledit)]

summary.span: 运行所有 对象，并且在所有验证规则都成功时，更新绑定源。

span.span: Runs all the objects and updates the binding sources if all validation rules succeed.

returns.span: 如果每个 都成功且将值提交到了源，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if every succeeds and the values are committed to the sources; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果每个成功, 则此方法会导致源提交挂起的更改并结束编辑事务 (如果源对象可以这样做)。If every succeeds, this method causes the sources to commit the pending changes and end the edit transaction, if a source object is capable of doing so. 对于实现 的中的每个对象, 调用For each object in that implements , calls ## Examples 下面的示例调用保存挂起的更改, 然后调用来准备要重新编辑的源。The following example calls to save the pending changes and then calls to prepare the source to be re-edited. span.span: The object that contains the specified property.

param.name: propertyName
param.span: 要获取其建议值的属性。

span.span: The property whose proposed value to get.

summary.span: 返回指定的属性和项的建议值。

span.span: Returns the proposed value for the specified property and item.
The proposed property value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在方法中使用此方法可获取要提交到源的值。Use this method in the method to get the value to be committed to the source. 返回值的类型取决于发生的阶段。The type of the return value depends on the stage at which the occurs. 例如 , 如果将数据绑定到类型为 integer 的属性, 并且调用的将其设置为, 则该方法将返回一个字符串。For example, if a is data bound to a property of type integer and the that calls has its set to , the method returns a string. 如果将其设置为, 则方法将返回绑定的转换器返回的任何类型。 If the has its set to , the method returns whatever type that is returned by the binding's converter. 在此示例中 , 通常返回整数。In this example, usually returns an integer. ## Examples 下面的示例是一个应用程序的一部分, 该应用程序提示用户输入多个客户, 并为每个客户分配一个销售代表。The following example is part of an application that prompts the user to enter multiple customers and assign a sales representative to each customer. 应用程序将检查销售代表和客户是否属于同一区域。The application checks that the sales representative and the customer belong to the same region. 该示例演示方法, 该方法使用方法获取客户输入的值。The example shows the method, which uses the method to get values that the customer entered. [!code-csharp[BindingGroupSnippets#ItemBindGroupValidationRule](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindingGroupSnippets/CSharp/Window2.xaml.cs#itembindgroupvalidationrule)] [!code-vb[BindingGroupSnippets#ItemBindGroupValidationRule](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindingGroupSnippets/visualbasic/window2.xaml.vb#itembindgroupvalidationrule)]

exception.span: 指定项和属性之间没有绑定。

span.span: There is not a binding for the specified item and property.

exception.span: 由于转换错误或早期验证规则失败，指定的属性值不可用。

span.span: The value of the specified property is not available, due to a conversion error or because an earlier validation rule failed.

summary.span: 获取 中的绑定对象所使用的源。

span.span: Gets the sources that are used by the Binding objects in the .

value.span: 中的绑定对象所使用的源。

span.span: The sources that are used by the Binding objects in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用作源的每个对象都添加到属性一次, 即使该对象用作多个绑定的源也是如此。Each object that is used as a source is added into the property once, even if the object is used as the source for multiple bindings. 通常, 中只有一个项, 这是一个对象, 该对象是使用的元素的。Often, there is just one item in , which is the object that is the of the element that uses the . 不过, 可以有多个源。It is possible for a to have multiple sources, however. 例如, 如果绑定对象共享相同但使用不同的源对象, 则用作源的每个对象都在中。 For example, if Binding objects share the same but use different source objects, each object that is used as a source is in . 如果绑定的路径解析为源的嵌套属性, 则中也可以有多个对象。There can also be multiple objects in if the path of a Binding resolves to a nested property of the source. 例如, 假设控件的绑定是的一部分 , 并且它是一个`Customer`对象, 该对象具有类型`Address`为的属性。For example, suppose a control's binding is a part of a and its is a `Customer` object, which has a property of type `Address`. 如果的为`Address.ZipCode`属性, 则会将添加到属性中。`Address` If the of the is the `Address.ZipCode` property, the `Address` is added to the property. ## Examples 以下示例是应用程序的一部分, 用于检查用户是否已将两个对象的属性设置为相等值。The following examples are part of an application that checks whether the user has set the properties of two objects to equal values. 第一个示例创建两个控件, 其中每个控件都绑定到不同的源。The first example creates two controls, each of which are data bound to a different source. 第一个绑定从 `object1`控件的父元素的 ( ) 获取其源。The binding of the first gets its source, `object1`, from the of the control's parent element (the ). 在第二个中, 绑定的源设置为。 `object2`On the second , the source of the binding is set to `object2`. 该示例还创建了一个显示验证错误的。The example also creates a that displays validation errors. [!code-xaml[BindingGroupSnippets#BindingGroupName](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindingGroupSnippets/CSharp/Window3.xaml#bindinggroupname)] [!code-xaml[BindingGroupSnippets#ValidationAdornerSite](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindingGroupSnippets/CSharp/Window3.xaml#validationadornersite)] 下面的示例演示前面的示例使用的。The following example shows the that the previous example uses. 在方法中, 该示例从获取每个源对象, 并检查对象的属性是否相等。 In the method, the example gets each source object from the and checks whether the properties of the objects are equal. [!code-csharp[BindingGroupSnippets#BindingGroupNameValidationRule](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindingGroupSnippets/CSharp/Window3.xaml.cs#bindinggroupnamevalidationrule)] [!code-vb[BindingGroupSnippets#BindingGroupNameValidationRule](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindingGroupSnippets/visualbasic/window3.xaml.vb#bindinggroupnamevalidationrule)]

summary.span: 获取或设置标识 的名称，该名称可用于在 中包括和排除绑定对象。

span.span: Gets or sets the name that identifies the , which can be used to include and exclude Binding objects in the .
The name that identifies the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 为`null`, 则具有与具有参与的元素的相同的源的绑定。If is `null`, bindings that have a source that is the same object as the of the element that has the participate in the . 可以包含与父元素的源不同的绑定, 该父元素的设置为 , 并将绑定的 属性设置为相同的值。You can include bindings that have a source that is different from the of the parent element that has the by setting of the and the property of a binding to the same value. 您可以排除与父元素具有相同源的绑定, 该父元素的设置为 , 并将绑定的属性设置为不同的值。You can exclude bindings that have the same source as of the parent element that has the by setting of the and the property of a binding to different values. ## Examples 以下示例是应用程序的一部分, 用于检查用户是否已将两个对象的属性设置为相等值。The following examples are part of an application that checks whether the user has set the properties of two objects to equal values. 第一个示例创建两个控件, 其中每个控件都绑定到不同的源。The first example creates two controls, each of which are data bound to a different source. 第一个的绑定是的 一部分, 因为继承其父对象中的和。The binding of the first is part of the because the inherits the and from its parent . 第二个的绑定是的一部分, 原因 是的和的均设置为`bindingGroup`。The binding on the second is part of the because the of the and the of the are both set to `bindingGroup`. [!code-xaml[BindingGroupSnippets#BindingGroupName](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindingGroupSnippets/CSharp/Window3.xaml#bindinggroupname)] [!code-xaml[BindingGroupSnippets#ValidationAdornerSite](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindingGroupSnippets/CSharp/Window3.xaml#validationadornersite)] 下面的示例演示前面的示例使用的。The following example shows the that the previous example uses. 在方法中, 该示例从获取每个源对象, 并检查对象的属性是否相等。 In the method, the example gets each source object from the and checks whether the properties of the objects are equal. [!code-csharp[BindingGroupSnippets#BindingGroupNameValidationRule](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindingGroupSnippets/CSharp/Window3.xaml.cs#bindinggroupnamevalidationrule)] [!code-vb[BindingGroupSnippets#BindingGroupNameValidationRule](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindingGroupSnippets/visualbasic/window3.xaml.vb#bindinggroupnamevalidationrule)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 是否重新使用尚未提交到源的目标值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the reuses target values that have not been committed to the source.

value.span: 如果 重新使用尚未提交到源的目标值，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the reuses target values that have not been committed to the source; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建议的值是在绑定的目标上已更改但尚未提交到源的值。A proposed value is a value that has been changed on the target of a binding, but has not been committed to the source. 例如, 假设上有一个双向绑定 , 并且属性设置为。For example, suppose that there is a two-way binding on a and the property is set to . 如果用户更改的值, 则建议的值是在将其提交到源之前在中的值。If the user changes the value of the , the proposed value is the value that is in the before it is committed to source. 当为`true`时, 如果一个绑定离开 system.windows.data.bindinggroup>, 则使用建议的值, 并且具有相同源的另一个绑定将联接到 system.windows.data.bindinggroup>。When is `true`, the uses the proposed value when one binding leaves the BindingGroup and another Binding with the same source joins the BindingGroup. 例如, 假设应用程序允许用户编辑多个字段, 并通过单击按钮来更新源对象。For example, suppose that an application enables a user to edit multiple fields and update the source object by clicking a button. 如果未编辑字段, 应用程序会将其显示在中。When a field is not being edited, the application displays it in a . 当用户开始编辑字段时, 应用程序会将替换 为。When the user begins to edit a field, the application replaces the with a . 当用户完成字段编辑后, 应用程序会将替换 为。When the user finishes editing that field, the application replaces the with a . 由于在用户单击该按钮之前不会更新源, 因此必须有一种方法来显示建议的值。Because the source is not updated until the user clicks the button, there must be a way for the to display the proposed value. 通过将设置`true`为, 应用程序将显示用户对字段所做的更改, 即使未更新源也是如此。By setting to `true`, the application will display the user's changes to a field even when the source has not been updated.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool TryGetValue (object item, string propertyName, out object value);
.method public hidebysig instance bool TryGetValue(object item, string propertyName, [out] object& value) cil managed
Public Function TryGetValue (item As Object, propertyName As String, ByRef value As Object) As Boolean
public: bool TryGetValue(System::Object ^ item, System::String ^ propertyName, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::Object ^ % value);

span.span: The object that contains the specified property.

param.name: propertyName
param.span: 要获取其建议值的属性。

span.span: The property whose proposed value to get.

param.name: value
param.span: 此方法在返回时包含一个表示建议的属性值的对象。

span.span: When this method returns, contains an object that represents the proposed property value.

param.span: 此参数未经初始化即被传递。

span.span: This parameter is passed uninitialized.

summary.span: 尝试获取指定属性和项的建议值。

span.span: Attempts to get the proposed value for the specified property and item.

returns.span: 如果值为指定属性的建议值，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if value is the proposed value for the specified property; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`false`没有指定项和属性的绑定, 或者如果指定的属性的值不可用, 则返回; 如果指定的属性的值不可用, 则返回。 returns `false` if there is not a binding for the specified item and property or if the value of the specified property is not available, due to a conversion error or because an earlier validation rule failed. 在方法中使用此方法可获取要提交到源的值。Use this method in the method to get the value to be committed to the source. 类型`value`取决于发生的阶段。The type `value` depends on the stage at which the occurs. 例如, 如果将绑定到类型为 integer 的属性的数据, `value` 则如果调用的设置为, 则为字符串。For example, if a is data bound to a property of type integer, `value` is a string if the that calls has its set to . 如果将其 设置`value`为, 则的类型是绑定的转换器返回的任何类型。 If the has its set to , the type of `value` is whatever type that is returned by the binding's converter. 在此示例中`value` , 通常为一个整数。In this example, `value` is usually an integer. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个名为`ValidateDateAndPrice`的自定义。The following example creates a custom named `ValidateDateAndPrice`. 在方法中, 该示例使用方法和属性来获取用户在窗体中输入的值。 In the method, the example uses the method and the property to get the values the user entered into the form. 然后, 该示例将检查某一项是否超过100美元, 该项目将在至少7天内可用。Then the example checks that if an item is over 100 dollars, it will be available for at least seven days. 此示例是类中更大示例的一部分This example is part of a larger example on the class [!code-csharp[BindingGroupSnippets#ValidateObject](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindingGroupSnippets/CSharp/Data.cs#validateobject)] [!code-vb[BindingGroupSnippets#ValidateObject](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindingGroupSnippets/visualbasic/data.vb#validateobject)]

summary.span: 如果所有验证规则都成功，则对绑定和将 属性设置为 、 或 的 对象运行转换器，并将目标值保存到源对象。

span.span: Runs the converter on the binding and the objects that have the property set to , , or and saves the values of the targets to the source objects if all the validation rules succeed.

returns.span: 如果所有验证规则都成功，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if all validation rules succeed; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果每个成功, 则此方法会更新源, 但不会导致源提交挂起的更改并结束编辑事务。This method updates the source if every succeeds, but it does not cause the sources to commit the pending changes and end the edit transaction. 也就是说, 如果源对象实现, 则为。That is, if the source object implements . 调用此方法不会导致调用。Calling this method does not cause to be called. 使用方法让源提交挂起的更改。Use the method to have the sources commit the pending changes. ## Examples 下面的示例是一个应用程序的一部分, 该应用程序提示用户输入多个客户, 并为每个客户分配一个销售代表。The following example is part of an application that prompts the user to enter multiple customers and assign a sales representative to each customer. 应用程序将检查销售代表和客户是否属于同一区域。The application checks that the sales representative and the customer belong to the same region. 如果所有验证规则都成功, 则示例将调用来验证绑定并将值保存到源。The example calls to validate the bindings and save the values to the source if all the validation rules succeed. [!code-csharp[BindingGroupSnippets#UpdateSources](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindingGroupSnippets/CSharp/Window2.xaml.cs#updatesources)] [!code-vb[BindingGroupSnippets#UpdateSources](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindingGroupSnippets/visualbasic/window2.xaml.vb#updatesources)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当添加到时 , 将传入作为方法的第一个参数。 When a is added to a , the is passed in as the first parameter of the method. 您可以通过使用或方法获取对象的建议值。You can get the proposed values of the object by using the or method. 可以从属性获取作为绑定源的对象。You can get the objects that are the sources of the bindings from the property. ## Examples 下面的示例将自定义 `ValidateDateAndPrice`添加到。The following example adds the custom , `ValidateDateAndPrice`, to the . [!code-xaml[BindingGroupSnippets#BindingGroup](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindingGroupSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#bindinggroup)] 下面的示例展示了 `ValidateDateAndPrice` 类。The following example shows the `ValidateDateAndPrice` class. 方法使用来获取用户在窗体中输入的值, 并检查项是否超过100美元, 此值至少可用于七天。The method uses the to get the values the user entered into the form, and checks that if an item is over 100 dollars, it will be available for at least seven days.
